ComicInfo.Penciller: Peter Kuper,Hermann Mejia,Sergio Aragonés,Tom Fowler,Tom Bunk,Peter Kuper,Dave Berg,Gary Hallgren
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fundalini Pages: Various short satires of pop culture.
The Rise And Fall Of A Rap Star: Satire on meteoric rise and fall of rap and hip hop music stars.
What The Deal Or No Deal Models Are Thinking: Phony captions of what the models are thinking when standing on stage.
Sergio Aragonès Presents A Mad Look at Road Trips: A look at some ridiculous things that could happen while traveling the country by car.
Monroe and...The Natural Disaster: Monroe's family gets caught in a hurricane because they miss the evacuation notice, and their home is spared from destruction.
Comments You'll Never Hear No Matter How Long You Live: Everyday quotes too honest for anyone to actually say.
Spy Vs. Spy: In the first cartoon, the Black Spy tricks the White Spy into a trap. In the second cartoon, the White Spy outsmarts the Black Spy with a fake rocket.
The Darker Side of The Lighter Side: New gags written for Dave Berg's drawings.
Using Kid's Books To Explain The Awful Bush Years: Events of the Bush administration explained as parodies of children's books.
ComicInfo.Tags: Alfred E. Neuman,Lighter Side Doctor,George W. Bush,Black Spy,Jerry Seinfeld,Lil Wayne,Roger Kaputnik,Bill O'Reilly,Jenkins,Melvin,White Spy,Weird Al Yankovic,Bill Gates,Monroe
